= !ReadHandle property =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJPipe_.

*Class:* _[TPJPipe TPJPipe]_.

*Introduced:* v1.0

{{{
property ReadHandle: THandle;
}}}

== Description ==

This read only property provides access to Windows handle used to read data from the pipe. If this handle is inheritable it can be used with _[TPJConsoleApp TPJConsoleApp]_'s _[TPJConsoleAppStdIn StdIn]_ property to redirect console application input from a pipe.

Do not pass this handle to any Windows API function that may alter it (e.g. _!CloseHandle_).
